selectAllJobCategory: SELECT jc.*, count(ujc.CategoryID) AS CountCVWorker FROM jobcategories AS jc LEFT JOIN userjobcategories AS ujc ON jc.CategoryID = ujc.CategoryID GROUP BY jc.CategoryID
selectJobCategoryByUserWorkerID: SELECT * FROM jobcategories WHERE CategoryID NOT IN (SELECT CategoryID FROM userjobcategories WHERE UserWorkerID = ?)
selectCVByCategoryID: SELECT ujc.CategoryID, ujc.UserWorkerID, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDate, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.ActiveDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS ActiveDate, ua.FullName, jc.NameJobCategory, jc.ImageStore FROM userjobcategories AS ujc INNER JOIN useraccounts AS ua ON ujc.UserWorkerID = ua.UserAccountID AND CategoryID = 1002 INNER JOIN jobcategories AS jc ON ujc.CategoryID = jc.CategoryID
insertJobCategory: INSERT INTO jobcategories ( NameJobCategory , ImageStore) SELECT ?, ? WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT CategoryID FROM jobcategories WHERE NameJobCategory = ?) LIMIT 1
updateJobCategory: UPDATE jobcategories SET NameJobCategory = ?, ImageStore = ? WHERE CategoryID = ?
